member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.GetReducedActualSetup(System.String)
member.summary: Method delivers the actual physical setup (verified feeders/packaging units on the station tables) filtered by the target setup from SIPLACE Pro. If Setup Center is being used in partial setup mode this data is being filtered by the components of the partial setup. A partial setup includes the components of one or more recipes being selected in Line Control GUI in partial setup mode (Line Controls support the partial setup setting "Off", "Manual recipe selection" or "Automatic selection of downloaded recipe"). In case a component is set-up multiple times, all occurrences are part of this data even if the line does not use all of them.
member.param: The machine to consider.
member.returns: The actual setup of the specified machine.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Update(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Update the specified packaging unit(s).
member.remarks:
All packaging unit properties can be updated excluding and . The property will be also updated including all properties of the spliced packaging unit.
The packaging unit won't be updated when it is in use "Online" (on a machine).
All errors which occurred during execution can be get with or callbacks.
member.param: Packaging unit(s), which contain the new values of all packaging unit's properties.
member.returns: The list of successful updated packaging unit(s) (first packaging unit of the splice chain). Otherwise null, if operation was aborted because of a null reference. Packaging units, which couldn't be updated, are not in this list.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Get(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Gets the first packaging unit of the splice chain, which contains the corresponding UID.
member.param: The first packaging unit of the splice chain.
member.returns: The list of result of the operation for these packaging units

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Create(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Creates new packaging units.
member.remarks: Check and creates new packaging units in the Setup Center database. This command can be use to import packaging units before the Set or Refill action. If the packaging unit already exists, the packaging unit won't be created. All errors which occurred during execution can be get with or callbacks.
member.param: The new packaging unit
member.returns: The list of result of the operation for these packaging units

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Delete(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Deletes the packaging units with the corresponding UID.
member.remarks: If the packaging unit is in use or mounted to a feeder, the packaging unit won't be deleted. Otherwise the delete operation will be forced, even if the packaging unit is part of a splice chain. In this case, the whole splice chain will be deleted. All errors which occurred during execution can be get with or callbacks.
member.param: The packaging unit with the corresponding UID
member.returns: The list of result of the operation for these packaging units

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Activate(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.ComponentLocation[])
member.summary: Activates a deactivated track at the station. If the track is already active at the station, nothing will happen.
member.remarks: This command is not available for all tray feeders.
member.param: The locations which have to be activated.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Deactivate(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.ComponentLocation[],System.String)
member.summary: Deactivates an active track at the station. If the track is already deactivated, nothing will happen.
member.remarks: This command is not available for all tray feeders and for all stations of platform I and II. The deactivation of a track can be removed by the operator directly at the station (depends from settings) or via Setup Center.
member.param: The locations which have to be activated.
The reason.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Lock(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[],System.String)
member.summary: Locks material (The unlock is only possible by an external system again). Lock canâ€™t be avoided at the station. This functionality is an enhancement of Activate regarding priority.
member.remarks: This command is only available for stations of platform II+ and Sirio and in the offline area. The lock is permanent and cannot be removed by an operator at the station or via Setup Center. Locked material cannot be torn down, set, refilled or activated.
member.param: The packaging units which give the corresponding UID.
A text which give the operator what is the reason of the lock.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.Unlock(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Unlocks material, which was locked by an external system before. This functionality is an enhancement of Deactivate regarding priority.
member.remarks: This command is only available for stations of platform II+ and Sirio and in the offline area.
member.param: The packaging units which give the corresponding UID.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.GetPackagingUnitLocation(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Gets the current packaging unit location. Only works with Setup Center 6.3 and higher.
member.param: The packaging unit with the corresponding UID
member.returns: List of ComponentLocationResult Contains the ComponentLocation if the packaging unit is mounted online or offline. If the packaging unit is not mounted the value is null. The TableState attribute in ComponentLocation indicates whether a packaging unit is online, offline.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Interfaces.ISiplaceSetupCenter.UpdateSinglePackagingUnit(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Adjust all attributes of the packaging unit except the ones listed below for online mounted packaging units. Only works with Setup Center 6.3 and higher.
member.remarks: This method allows an update of every packaging unit regardless of the packaging unit status (unmounted, offline or online mounted). If a packaging unit chain is supplied then only the first packaging unit will be updated. The method will update all packaging unit attributes if the packaging unit is not mounted online. If the packaging unit is mounted online then the method will only update the packaging unit attributes not listed in the exception list below. The following attributes of the packaging unit cannot be updated if it is mounted online: [ComponentName], [ComponentBarcode], [ComponentBarcodeFragment], [OriginalQuantity], [Quantity], [GreyZone], [DepletedDate], [LastProductionDate], [BatchId], [Batch2], [BrightnessClass]
member.param: Packaging unit(s) containing the new attribute values.
member.returns: List of PackagingUnitResults: Each PackagingUnitResult contains the updated packaging unit in case of success, otherwise null.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SubscriptionDescription.NonPermanentSubscription
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [non permanent subscription].
member.value: true if [non permanent subscription]; otherwise, false.
member.remarks:
This function supports permanent and non permanent subscriptions. Non Permanent subscriptions are valid for 6 hours and will be refreshed 3 every hours. The events will be un-subscribed when Disposed. This means that crashes from programs will leave a subscription and a collecting mechanism which will be removed after 6 hours.
Permanent subscriptions are forever and have to be explicitly un-subscribed. The application can subscribe after a restart and receive all events between to application start.

member.name: T:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.NewRecipeActiveEvent
member.summary: Event will be raised, if there is a new recipe active on a station of the line. This will be only executed, if the machine reports back a new active recipe to Setup Center. The event will be fired independently for each conveyor lane and for each processing area. If the machine consists of 2 conveyor lanes and 2 processing areas then 4 events will be fired after recipe change (2 events for conveyor lane 1 and 2 events for conveyor lane 2) irrespective of whether both conveyor lanes contain the same recipe or not.
member.param: The arguments.
member.remarks: This event is currently only supported by SIRIO Version >= 709 and Setup Center >= 8.0

member.name: T:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.ConfigurationChangedEvent
member.summary:
The configuration changed event will be fired whenever the configuration of a setup center instance changes. The configuration class will contain the following settings:
OnlineVerificationConfiguration: The general settings for online verification of the Setup Center instance like IsSpliceMonitorActive, MissingSpliceThresholdPercent, MissingSpliceThresholdNumberOfItems.
LineConfigurations: For each line the settings for the line like IsFeederSubstitutionAllowed, IsAutomaticReorderActivated, IsRandomFeederSetupForOfflineVerificationAllowed etc. MachineConfigurations: For each station in the line the machine settings like MachineId, MachineName, MachineType, IsMsdVerificationEnabled and ComponentLevelIndicatorThresholds. PrinterConfigurations: For each printer in the line the printer settings like MachineId, PrinterPath, PrinterType.
DockingStationConfiguration: Contains the configuration for docking stations DockingStations: For each configured docking station contains the DockingStationId.
member.remarks: This event is currently only supported Setup Center >= 8.1

member.name: T:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.NewSetupControlDataRequestedEvent
member.summary: Event is fired by Setup Center when the station requests new setup control data (on NewSetupActive and when the station (re-)connects). It informs the MES that the station got new control data.
member.param: The arguments.
member.remarks: This event is currently only supported Setup Center >= 9.4

OnlineVerificationConfiguration: The general settings for online verification of the Setup Center instance like IsSpliceMonitorActive, MissingSpliceThresholdPercent, MissingSpliceThresholdNumberOfItems.
LineConfigurations: For each line the settings for the line like IsFeederSubstitutionAllowed, IsAutomaticReorderActivated, IsRandomFeederSetupForOfflineVerificationAllowed etc. MachineConfigurations: For each station in the line the machine settings like MachineId, MachineName, MachineType, IsMsdVerificationEnabled and ComponentLevelIndicatorThresholds. PrinterConfigurations: For each printer in the line the printer settings like MachineId, PrinterPath, PrinterType.
DockingStationConfiguration: Contains the configuration for docking stations DockingStations: For each configured docking station contains the DockingStationId.
member.remarks: This event is currently only supported Setup Center >= 8.1

member.name: F:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.MarshalEventsToObjectCreatorThread
member.summary: If true, all Events will be fired on the thread that created this Object. This is helpful if you use the Events to update the UI. In order for that to work correctly, you need a SynchronizationContext.Current when the SiplaceSetupCenter class is created (if this was done on the UI thread, then the SynchronizationContext.Current is there by default). The default value of this property is true.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.SubscriptionTimeout
member.summary: The TimeSpan, which is added to the current time when renewing the subscription to Setup Center Events This is only used when bNonPermanentSubscription is true when calling SubscribeToCoreEvents. The value must be greater or equal than one hour. The subscription is renewed every TimeSpan/3 hours. I.e. you provide 6 hours, the SC proxy renews the subscription every 2 hours.
member.value: The subscription timeout.

member.summary: Gets or sets the check alive frequency in ms. This value must be greater or equal to 10 seconds (10000) and less or equal to 1 hour (3600000). Default value is 60000 (1 minute) Can also be set in the application configuration file appSettings like so, value is in milliseconds:
member.value: The check alive frequency in ms.
member.exception: value;The CheckAliveFrequency must be greater or equal to 10 seconds (10000) and less or equal to 30 minutes (1800000).

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.GetReducedActualSetup(System.String)
member.summary: Method delivers the actual physical setup (verified feeders/packaging units on the station tables) filtered by the target setup from SIPLACE Pro. If Setup Center is being used in partial setup mode this data is being filtered by the components of the partial setup. A partial setup includes the components of one or more recipes being selected in Line Control GUI in partial setup mode (Line Controls support the partial setup setting "Off", "Manual recipe selection" or "Automatic selection of downloaded recipe"). In case a component is set-up multiple times, all occurrences are part of this data even if the line does not use all of them.
member.param: The machine to consider.
member.returns: The actual setup of the specified machine.

member.returns: The actual setups of the specified machine(s). MachineSetup may be null if machine Id is not found.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.Update(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Adjust all attributes of the packaging unit. In case of a packaging unit chain all packaging units in the chain will be updated.
member.param: Packaging unit(s), which contain the new values of all packaging unit's properties.
member.returns: The list of successful updated packaging unit(s) (first packaging unit of the splice chain). Otherwise null, if operation was aborted because of a null reference. Packaging units, which couldn't be updated, are not in this list.
member.remarks:
All packaging unit properties can be updated excluding and . The property will be also updated including all properties of the spliced packaging unit.
Online mounted packaging unit cannot be updated. An attempt to update an online mounted packaging unit will through an exception. Offline mounted packaging units can be updated. In case of packaging unit chains the whole chain has to be supplied otherwise the chain will automatically be split!
All errors which occurred during execution can be get with event.

member.summary: Deletes the packaging units with the corresponding UID.
member.param: The packaging unit with the corresponding UID
member.returns: The list of result of the operation for these packaging units
member.remarks: If the packaging unit is in use or mounted to a feeder, the packaging unit won't be deleted. Otherwise the delete operation will be forced, even if the packaging unit is part of a splice chain. In this case, the whole splice chain will be deleted.

The reason.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.Lock(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[],System.String)
member.summary: Locks material (The unlock is only possible by an external system again). Lock canâ€™t be avoided at the station. This functionality is an enhancement of Activate regarding priority. Throws an exception in case one or more packaging units could not be locked.
member.param: The packaging units which give the corresponding UID.
A text which give the operator what is the reason of the lock.
member.remarks: This command is only available for stations of platform II+ and Sirio and in the offline area. The lock is permanent and cannot be removed by an operator at the station or via Setup Center. Locked material cannot be torn down, set, refilled or activated.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.GetConfiguration
member.summary:
Gets the configuration of this Setup Center instance. It provides line configurations as well as the configured docking stations. The configuration class will contain the following settings:
OnlineVerificationConfiguration: The general settings for online verification of the Setup Center instance like IsSpliceMonitorActive, MissingSpliceThresholdPercent, MissingSpliceThresholdNumberOfItems.
LineConfigurations: For each line the settings for the line like IsFeederSubstitutionAllowed, IsAutomaticReorderActivated, IsRandomFeederSetupForOfflineVerificationAllowed etc. MachineConfigurations: For each station in the line the machine settings like MachineId, MachineName, MachineType, IsMsdVerificationEnabled and ComponentLevelIndicatorThresholds. PrinterConfigurations: For each printer in the line the printer settings like MachineId, PrinterPath, PrinterType.
DockingStationConfiguration: Contains the configuration for docking stations DockingStations: For each configured docking station contains the DockingStationId.
member.returns: The Configuration class holding the description of the Configuration valid for this Instance of Setup Center.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.FireInstantFeederPlacedEvents(Asm.As.OIB.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Types.VerificationType)
member.summary: Initiates the InstantFeederPlaced events from SetupCenter by selecting all currently placed feeders in the ActualSetup (online, offline or both depending of given verificationType argument)
member.param: The specified verification mode

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.GetPackagingUnitLocation(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Gets the current packaging unit location. Only works with Setup Center 6.3 and higher.
member.param: The packaging unit with the corresponding UID
member.returns: List of ComponentLocationResult Contains the ComponentLocation if the packaging unit is mounted online or offline. If the packaging unit is not mounted the value is null. The TableState attribute in ComponentLocation indicates whether a packaging unit is online, offline.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.UpdateSinglePackagingUnit(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit[])
member.summary: Adjust all attributes of the packaging unit except the ones listed below for online mounted packaging units. Only works with Setup Center 6.3 and higher.
member.param: Packaging unit(s) containing the new attribute values.
member.returns: List of PackagingUnitResults: Each PackagingUnitResult contains the updated packaging unit in case of success, otherwise null.
member.remarks: This method allows an update of every packaging unit regardless of the packaging unit status (unmounted, offline or online mounted). If a packaging unit chain is supplied then only the first packaging unit will be updated. The method will update all packaging unit attributes if the packaging unit is not mounted online. If the packaging unit is mounted online then the method will only update the packaging unit attributes not listed in the exception list below. The following attributes of the packaging unit cannot be updated if it is mounted online: [ComponentName], [ComponentBarcode], [ComponentBarcodeFragment], [OriginalQuantity], [Quantity], [GreyZone], [DepletedDate], [LastProductionDate], [BatchId], [Batch2], [BrightnessClass]

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.LockPackagingUnits(System.Collections.Generic.List{Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PackagingUnit},System.String)
member.summary: Locks material (The unlock is only possible by an external system again). Lock canâ€™t be avoided at the station. This functionality is an enhancement of Activate regarding priority.
member.param: The packaging units which give the corresponding UID.
A text which give the operator what is the reason of the lock.
member.returns: PackagingUnitResponse
member.remarks: This command is available for stations released for forced setup verification with Setup Center and in the offline area. The lock is permanent and cannot be removed by an operator at the station or via Setup Center. Only the affected packaging units have to be assigned. If splice chains are assigned, only the first packaging units will be recognized. Spliced packaging units will be ignored. The lock will be persisted and is marked with Reason=0 and Source = 4 in the LockInfo object.

member.returns: PackagingUnitResponse
member.remarks: This command is only available for stations of platform II+ and Sirio and in the offline area. The lock will be persisted and is marked with Reason=0 and Source = 4 in the LockInfo object.

member.summary: Gets the current packaging unit mount location. Returns a PackagingUnitMountLocation object for each packaging unit. If the packaging unit is mounted online or offline then the ComponentLocation in the PackagingUnitMountLocation is filled. If the packaging unit is only mounted on a feeder then the ComponentLocation in the PackagingUnitMountLocation is null and the FeederLocation in the PackagingUnitMountLocation is filled. If the packaging unit is not mounted at all the OutValue of the result is null.
member.remarks: This method will only deliver results for Setup Center 9.2 or higher!
member.param: The list of packaging units to get the mount location for
member.returns: GetPackagingUnitMountLocationResponse containing the mount locations.

If there is no packaging unit mounted on the feeder the PackagingUnitLocation is null.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.6 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.RegisterChangeoverTable(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.RegisterChangeoverTableRequest)
member.summary: Registers the specified changeover table (COT) to the specified station location. Before calling this function the COT has to be placed into the location.
member.param: Request object containing the Machine ID, Station location number" and table Id
member.returns: The Result.ResultItems contain a ResultItem. The ResultItem.State indicates if the operation was successful. The ResultItem.State contains the following values: 1 : OK 2 : Error In case of error the ResultItem.Messages will contain the reason of the failure.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.MoveChangeoverTableIntoStationLocation(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.MoveChangeoverTableIntoStationLocationRequest)
member.summary: Moves the specified changeover table (COT) into the specified station location. Before calling this function the COT has to be placed into the location so that the machine can pull in it automatically.
member.param: Request object containing the Machine ID and Station location number
member.returns: The Result.ResultItems contain a ResultItem. The ResultItem.State indicates if the operation was successful. The ResultItem.State contains the following values: 1 : OK 2 : Error In case of error the ResultItem.Messages will contain the reason of the failure.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.MoveChangeoverTableOutOfStationLocation(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.MoveChangeoverTableOutOfStationLocationRequest)
member.summary: Moves the specified changeover table (COT) out of the specified station location. After this function is successfully completed the COT can be removed from location
member.param: Request object containing the Machine ID and Station location number
member.returns: The Result.ResultItems contain a ResultItem. The ResultItem.State indicates if the operation was successful. The ResultItem.State contains the following values: 1 : OK 2 : Error In case of error the ResultItem.Messages will contain the reason of the failure.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.GetChangeOverTablesOfActiveSetup(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.GetChangeOverTablesOfActiveSetupRequest)
member.summary: Gets the changeover table (COT) information of the active recipe. If the prepared COTs are not already registered this function will return the prepared COTs. If a location has no COT then it will be omitted in the returned list! The logic is: 1. If a COT is registered to a station location then return it 2. Otherwise check if a COT is prepared in pre-setup area for the active setup and return it. 3. Otherwise return null.
member.param: Request object containing a list of machine IDs
member.returns: Result object containing a list of TableLocations per machine id
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.SubscribeToCoreEvents(System.String)
member.summary:
Subscribe to the events being sent by the Core Eventing
This function supports non permanent subscriptions. Non Permanent subscriptions are valid for 6 hours and will be refreshed 3 every hours. The events will be un-subscribed when Disposed. This means that crashes from programs will leave a subscription and a collecting mechanism which will be removed after 6 hours.
member.param: The host name of the OIB Core computer
member.returns: success, if the subscriptions could be done

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.SubscribeToCoreEvents(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Subscribe to the events being sent by the Core Eventing
member.param: The host name of the SIPLACE Core

Name of the callback endpoint used for getting the events. The CallbackName is a part of the callback endpoint address: CallbackName: "SiplaceSetupCenterNotify" --> resulting Callback Endpoint Address: "http://MachineName:1405/SiplaceSetupCenterNotify/"
member.returns: success, if the subscriptions could be done
member.remarks: This function supports non permanent subscriptions. Non Permanent subscriptions are valid for 6 hours and will be refreshed 3 every hours. The events will be un-subscribed when Disposed. This means that crashes from programs will leave a subscription and a collecting mechanism which will be removed after 6 hours.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Proxy.Business.Objects.SiplaceSetupCenter.SubscribeToCoreEvents(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Subscribe to the events being sent by the Core Eventing
member.param: The host name of the SIPLACE Core

Name of the callback endpoint used for getting the events. The CallbackName is a part of the callback endpoint address: CallbackName: "SiplaceSetupCenterNotify" --> resulting Callback Endpoint Address: "http://MachineName:1405/SiplaceSetupCenterNotify/"
If true, the Subscription will not be permanent.
member.returns: success, if the subscriptions could be done
member.remarks:
This function supports permanent and non permanent subscriptions. Non Permanent subscriptions are valid for 6 hours and will be refreshed 3 every hours. The events will be un-subscribed when Disposed. This means that crashes from programs will leave a subscription and a collecting mechanism which will be removed after 6 hours.
Permanent subscriptions are forever and have to be explicitly un-subscribed. The application can subscribe after a restart and receive all events between to application start.

member.returns: success, if the subscriptions could be done
